import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { DataService } from '../../services/data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-statistics', templateUrl: './statistics.component.html', styleUrls: ['./statistics.component.css'] }) export class StatisticsComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private dataService: DataService) { } ngOnInit(): void { // TODO: fetch chart data this.dataService.getChartData().subscribe({ next: (data) => { console.log('Chart data:', data); // TODO: update chart with data }, error: (error) => { console.error('Error fetching chart data:', error); } }); } }
